category: Marketing Regulations/Article 10 (Responsibilities of Commercial Rights Holders)
contents: Article 10 (Responsibilities of commercial rights holder) ① Commercial rights holders must faithfully comply with all matters related to the contract concluded with the Sports Council. ② The commercial rights holder must use the rights within the scope of the rights determined in the contract with the Sports Council. ③ If the commercial rights holder exercises his/her rights beyond the scope set by the contract, or causes harm or damage to the dignity, reputation, or image of the sports association and its marketing assets, he/she shall be fully responsible and compensate for the damages.
